title: Is NCERT enough for anatomy of flowering plant to crack the NEET 2021? Should I refer to any module? Is it enough? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: For anatomy of flowering plant ncert is more than enough . For understanding purpose, you can refer any coaching module. And don't forget to practice previous yr mcqs. All the best.
Yes it is enough. And that’s it. Just keep a note of all the examples you study form plant physiology.
